name: PSLock
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: p. s. lock
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the App "PS Lock", you can easily operate our Bluetooth locks with the "Alexa" voice control.

To get started, make sure you have the latest version of the app installed on your device and have linked the user to your "Alexa" account.

Once you have selected the desired lock for this function, you can name it individually after entering the code, e.g. "drawer"
